meanings.definition: Improve the skills or abilities of (someone) through training or education.
meanings.sent1: She upskilled her team by providing them with additional training sessions.
meanings.sent2: The company upskilled its employees by offering online courses.
meanings.sent3: The magician upskilled his rabbit to perform new tricks.
meanings.sent4: The coach upskilled the players, turning them into a formidable team.
meanings.sent5: The teacher upskilled her students, helping them excel in their studies.

meanings.definition: The action of improving one's skills or abilities through training or education.
meanings.sent1: His upskilling led to a promotion at work.
meanings.sent2: The upskilling of the workforce resulted in increased productivity.
meanings.sent3: The robot's upskilled programming made it the star of the show.
meanings.sent4: The artist's upskilled techniques brought her international recognition.
meanings.sent5: The upskilling of the team transformed them into industry leaders.
